content: I am doing an experiment to see if I can restructure the format_args! data to improve perf. I may be in over my head but it's at least a good learning experience. One thing I do not understand is Count::Param and ArgumentV1::from_usize. Is there any reason for Arguments to be aware of these param indices? Couldn't we just copy the value and just use Count::Is instead?
(You might want to ask in #t-libs)
